ActTackling Violent Crime Act
SubjectBill C-2, An Act To Amend the Criminal Code and to make consequential amendments to other Acts (Tackling Violent Crime Act) COMING INTO FORCE
PrecisOrder fixing the date which certain provisions of this Act, being chapter 6 of the Statutes of Canada, 2008, COME INTO FORCE, as follows: May 1, 2008 - sections 1 to 17, 28 to 38, 54, 57 and 58 July 2, 2008 - sections 18 to 27, 39 to 53, 55, 56 59 and 60
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0034 Publication Date: 2008-04-02
AttachmentsAttachment
